tool.name: libraries
tool.command:
parsec libraries copy_from_dataset --library_id "$library_id" --dataset_id "$dataset_id"
#if $folder_id --folder_id "$folder_id" #end if #if $message --message "$message" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: library_id
param.label: library_id
param.help: id of the library where to place the uploaded file

param.name: dataset_id
param.label: dataset_id
param.help: id of the dataset to copy from

param.name: folder_id
param.label: folder_id
param.help: id of the folder where to place the uploaded files. If not provided, the root folder will be used

tool.help: Copy a Galaxy dataset into a library.
